妖怪変化: (ようかいへんげ) - (yoji) (animal making a) monstrous apparition
妖花: (ようか) - enchantingly beautiful flower; bewitching beauty
妖術: (ようじゅつ) - black magic; black art; witchcraft; sorcery
妖術者: (ようじゅつしゃ) - magician; sorcerer; sorceress
妖言: (ようげん) - dire prophecy that creates confusion
妙: (myou) - exquisito, estranho, esquisito, ímpar, curioso; maravilha, mistério, milagre, excelência; inteligência, destreza, habilidade, competência
妙ちきりん: (みょうちきりん) - weird; odd; bizarre; curious
妙なる: (たえなる) - exquisite (e.g. melody); melodious; delicate; enchanting
妙なる調べ: (たえなるしらべ) - enchanting melody; sweet tune
妙な話だが: (みょうなはなしだが) - curiously enough; oddly enough; strange to tell
妙に思う: (みょうにおもう) - to think (something) strange
妙を得る: (みょうをえる) - to be skillful; to be clever
妙手: (みょうしゅ) - spectacular move (chess, shogi, etc.)/brilliant move; expert/virtuoso/master
妙技: (みょうぎ) - exquisite skill; wonderful performance
妙案: (みょうあん) - ingenious idea; excellent plan; bright idea
妙法: (みょうほう) - mysteries/excellent methods; marvelous law of Buddha/Saddharma; Lotus Sutra/teachings of the Lotus Sutra
妙法蓮華経: (みょうほうれんげきょう) - Sutra on the Lotus of the Marvelous Law; Lotus Sutra
妙用: (みょうよう) - mysterious influence; mysterious effect
妙薬: (みょうやく) - wonder drug; miracle cure; elixir
妙見菩薩: (みょうけんぼさつ) - Myoken (bodhisattva; deification of the North Star or the Big Dipper)
妙計: (みょうけい) - ingenious trick; good idea; clever scheme
妙諦: (みょうたい) - amazing truth; cardinal principle; key (to understanding)
妙趣: (みょうしゅ) - exquisite beauty or charms
妙音: (みょうおん) - exquisite voice; exquisite music
妥当性確認試験: (だとうせいかくにんしけん) - validation (test)
妨害工作員: (ぼうがいこうさくいん) - saboteur
妨害戦術: (ぼうがいせんじゅつ) - (yoji) obstructive tactics; harassing tactics
妨害放送: (ぼうがいほうそう) - radio jamming
妨碍: (ぼうがい) - disturbance; obstruction; hindrance; jamming; interference
妨礙: (ぼうがい) - disturbance; obstruction; hindrance; jamming; interference
妬く: (やく) - to be jealous of; to be envious of; to envy
妬ける: (やける) - (焼ける only) to burn/to be roasted/to be heated/to be sunburnt/to fade (in the sun)/to glow red (i.e. of the sky at sunset); to be jealous/to be envious
妹分: (いもうとぶん) - protegee; someone who one considers as a younger sister
妹婿: (いもうとむこ) - the husband of one's younger sister
妹背鳥: (いもせどり) - any bird of family Motacillidae (excluding the pipits); lesser cuckoo (Cuculus poliocephalus)
妻: (sai/esposa) - wife , wife; garnish (esp. one served with sashimi); embellishment
妻せる: (めあわせる) - to marry off; to espouse to
妻の命: (つまのみこと) - you (referring to one's spouse or partner); dear
妻入: (つまいり) - Japanese traditional architectural style where the main entrance is on one or both of the gabled sides
妻入り: (つまいり) - Japanese traditional architectural style where the main entrance is on one or both of the gabled sides
妻合せる: (めあわせる) - to marry off; to espouse to
妻合わせる: (めあわせる) - to marry off; to espouse to
妻君: (めぎみ) - (女君 only) someone else's daughter; one's wife
妻問婚: (つまどいこん) - type of marriage where the man merely visits his wife without living with her; duolocal marriage
妻女: (さいじょ) - one's wife; one's wife and daughter or daughters
妻妾: (さいしょう) - one's wife and mistress(es)
妻子を携える: (さいしをたずさえる) - to be accompanied by one's family
妻子持ち: (さいしもち) - man with wife and kids
妻子眷属: (さいしけんぞく) - (yoji) one's wife, children, and other relations; one's whole family
妻帯者: (さいたいしゃ) - a married man
妻戸: (つまど) - (pair of) wooden doors in the interior of a home; door to a pavilion in a Heian period palace
妻白: (ツマジロ) - silvertip shark (Carcharhinus albimarginatus, a requiem shark found throughout the tropical Indian and Pacific Oceans)
妻黒: (ツマグロ) - blacktip reef shark (Carcharhinus melanopterus, species of requiem shark mostly found in the Indo-Pacific); (original meaning) black tip
